plot: A black man who moves to Los Angeles discovers an anti-black conspiracy by Mexicans that threatens to harm both him and his children.
title: The Secret Map of Los Angeles
plot_es: A black man who moves to Los Angeles discovers an anti-black conspiracy by Mexicans that threatens to harm both him and his children.
original_name: The Secret Map of Los Angeles
